verses.roman:
'kāli duḥkha pāilā, aparādha nā la-ibā mora
avaśya karimu āmi tomāya aṅgīkāra

synonyms: kāli—yesterday; duḥkha pāilā—you were disappointed; aparādha—offense; nā la-ibā—please do not take; mora—my; avaśya—certainly; karimu—shall do; āmi—I; tomāya—unto you; aṅgīkāra—acceptance.
translation: "Last night you were disappointed. Please excuse my offense. I shall certainly accept you.
